abstract: Warren E. Buffett, chairman of Berkshire Hathaway, revealed on CNBC that the conglomerate holds a $10.7 billion stake in I.B.M.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett, chairman of Berkshire Hathaway, revealed on CNBC that the conglomerate holds a $10.7 billion stake in I.B.M.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett, the chairman and chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, revealed on CNBC that his conglomerate had amassed 64 million shares of I.B.M, a stake of about 5.5 percent. Read the entire post on DealBook.

headline.main: DealBook: Berkshire Amasses 5.5% Stake in I.B.M.
